intro.0: Long ago{sleep 2}, two races&ruled over Earth{sleep 2}:&HUMANS and MONSTERS.{sleep 12}
intro.1: One day{sleep 2}, war broke&out between the two&races.{sleep 12}
intro.2: After a long battle{sleep 2}, &the humans were&victorious.{sleep 12}
intro.3: They sealed the monsters&underground with a magic&spell.
intro.6: Legends say that those&who climb the mountain&never return.
